title: Последний герой
overview: The Last Hero (Russian: Последний герой, romanized: Posledniy geroy) is the Russian version of the Swedish reality show, Robinson.Two teams will spend time in the primeval jungle, fighting the elements, hunger, dangerous animals, insects and each other. But the main test that awaits the heroes is an invisible internal struggle to preserve their best human qualities and not turn into a savage. In the end there will only be one left. Last Hero.
